files.description: Runs the project test command, captures stdout/stderr plus exit code and environment snapshot (Python version and pip freeze), and writes all artifacts to outputs/ using a stable timestamped naming convention.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/run.py", "scripts/run_pipeline.py", "scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py"]
Summary: Created scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py to run tests and save logs, exit code, and environment snapshots into outputs/ with a stable timestamped run ID.

FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/run.py", "scripts/run_pipeline.py", "scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py"]
Summary: Created a test runner that captures stdout/stderr, exit code, and environment snapshots into timestamped outputs artifacts.

files.description: Validates that the expected outputs/ artifacts from the most recent run exist and are non-empty, intended for use as a CI/local enforcement check.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/verify_test_artifacts.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/run.py", "scripts/run_pipeline.py", "scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py", "scripts/verify_test_artifacts.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a verification script that locates the latest outputs/ run artifacts by prefix and fails if required logs/snapshots are missing or empty.

FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/verify_test_artifacts.py
DIR_STATE:["scripts/run.py", "scripts/run_pipeline.py", "scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py", "scripts/verify_test_artifacts.py"]
Summary: Added scripts/verify_test_artifacts.py to enforce that the latest outputs/ run artifacts exist and required ones are non-empty.

files.description: GitHub Actions workflow that executes scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py and then enforces artifact creation via scripts/verify_test_artifacts.py while uploading outputs/ as build artifacts.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml"]
SUMMARY: Added a GitHub Actions workflow to run log-capturing tests, verify outputs artifacts, and upload outputs/ as build artifacts.

FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/tests-and-capture-artifacts.yml"]
Summary: Added a GitHub Actions workflow to run the test-capture script, verify outputs artifacts, and upload outputs/ on every run (even on failure).

files.description: Keeps the outputs directory tracked in git so logs and snapshots have a consistent destination.

errors.detail:
FILE_WRITTEN:outputs/.gitkeep
DIR_STATE:["outputs/.gitkeep"]
SUMMARY: Added outputs/.gitkeep to ensure outputs/ remains tracked for stable artifact destinations.

FILE_WRITTEN:outputs/.gitkeep
DIR_STATE:["outputs/.gitkeep"]
SUMMARY: Added outputs/.gitkeep to keep the outputs directory tracked for stable log and snapshot destinations.

missionDescription: Execute `scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py`, store logs + exit code + environment snapshot (Python version, pip freeze) under `./outputs/` with a stable naming convention; add a CI/local check to ensure these artifacts are produced.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Adds operational observability: saving test harness logs and environment metadata makes failures reproducible and accelerates resolving the blocked task by providing concrete diagnostics instead of mi...
